thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com
thread.title: Ted

author: Ted
title: Ted
text: I bought a ticket for the Big 12 Men's BBall championship on ticketcity.com after comparing 5 sites, all of which had the same seat available. Surprisingly, the prices varied, and Ticketcity's was over $20 under the others. I got an email confirmation after buying the seat, then got instructions for picking up the ticket the day of the game. The pickup process was fast, I got a free Ticketcity.com lanyard to keep my ticket in, AND my team won. Doesn't get much better than that!
